entries.content: Sit down with your sales team and list the top objections and frustrations they get daily or weekly from prospects and customers.
entries.notes: Method for discovering common objections faced by the sales team.

entries.content: Leverage the list of top objections on your website copy, for example, in an FAQ section on relevant service or product pages.
entries.notes: Using discovered objections to proactively address concerns for potential buyers.

entries.content: Addressing common objections on your website saves the sales team time by answering questions before they arise on a sales call.
entries.notes: Efficiency gain from proactive objection handling based on discovery.

entries.content: Understand the main drivers (root cause) of motivation by asking 'why is that important to you' and diving deeper.
entries.notes: Applied to understanding sales reps' motivation, but the technique of diving deeper to find the root cause is applicable to buyer needs/objections.

focus_area: Objection Discovery: Clarifying questions, isolation, root cause
